title: Annual Chess Championship
description: Highlights from our annual chess championship where students compete for the university title.

title: Masters vs. Students Match
description: A special event where chess masters from the region played against our top university students.

title: Chess Strategy Workshop
description: Students learning advanced chess strategies and tactics from Grandmaster Elizabeth Chen.

title: Chess in the Park
description: Our monthly outdoor chess event in the university park, open to all students and faculty.

title: International Chess Day Celebration
description: A special gathering to celebrate International Chess Day with exhibitions and friendly matches.

title: Beginners Chess Camp
description: A weekend camp for beginners to learn the fundamentals of chess in a friendly environment.

title: Chess Club Welcome Party
description: The welcome event for new members joining our chess society for the academic year.

title: Chess Exhibition with Grandmaster
description: A special exhibition match featuring International Grandmaster visiting our university.

title: Virtual Chess Tournament
description: Our first-ever online chess tournament connecting students from multiple universities.
